data.actual_result: Even if they aren't links, embed title will always be blue on Android, while they are white on Desktop
data.expected_result: Title should only be blue if it is actually a link. It is the case for GitHub webhooks or attached files for example
data.short_description: Embed titles are always blue even if they aren't links
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a simple embed with a title using a bot - Compare title between Android and Desktop
